MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow, this is also affecting the surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.13pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to grounded overhead lines and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.10pm on Tuesday 1st December 2020.
